verses.verse: Run <S%H7751><s%> you to and fro <S%H7751><s%> through the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> and know, <S%H3045><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> in the broad <S%H7339><s%> places thereof, if <S%H518><s%> you can find <S%H4672><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> if <S%H518><s%> there be any that executes <S%H6213><s%> judgment, <S%H4941><s%> that seeks <S%H1245><s%> the truth; <S%H530><s%> and I will pardon <S%H5545><s%> it.
And though <S%H518><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> lives; <S%H2416><s%> surely <S%H403><s%> they swear <S%H7650><s%> falsely. <S%H8267><s%>

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> are not your eyes <S%H5869><s%> on the truth? <S%H530><s%> you have stricken <S%H5221><s%> them, but they have not grieved; <S%H2342><s%> you have consumed <S%H3615><s%> them, but they have refused <S%H3985><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> correction: <S%H4148><s%> they have made their faces <S%H6440><s%> harder <S%H2388><s%> than a rock; <S%H5553><s%> they have refused <S%H3985><s%> to return. <S%H7725><s%>

Therefore I said, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> these <S%H1992><s%> are poor; <S%H1800><s%> they are foolish: <S%H2973><s%> for they know <S%H3045><s%> not the way <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> nor the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of their God. <S%H430><s%>

I will get <S%H3212><s%> me to the great <S%H1419><s%> men, and will speak <S%H1696><s%> to them; for they have known <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of their God: <S%H430><s%> but these <S%H1992><s%> have altogether <S%H3162><s%> broken <S%H7665><s%> the yoke, <S%H5923><s%> and burst <S%H5423><s%> the bonds. <S%H4147><s%>

Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> out of the forest <S%H3293><s%> shall slay <S%H5221><s%> them, and a wolf <S%H2061><s%> of the evenings <S%H6160><s%> shall spoil <S%H7703><s%> them, a leopard <S%H5246><s%> shall watch <S%H8245><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> their cities: <S%H5892><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one that goes <S%H3318><s%> out there <S%H2007><s%> shall be torn <S%H2963><s%> in pieces: because <S%H3588><s%> their transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are many, <S%H7231><s%> and their backslidings <S%H4878><s%> are increased. <S%H6105><s%>

How <S%H335><s%> shall I pardon <S%H5545><s%> you for this? <S%H2063><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, and sworn <S%H7650><s%> by them that are no <S%H3808><s%> gods: <S%H430><s%> when I had fed them to the full, <S%H7646><s%> they then committed <S%H5003><s%> adultery, <S%H5003><s%> and assembled <S%H1413><s%> themselves by troops in the harlots' <S%H2181><s%> houses. <S%H1004><s%>

They were as fed <S%H2109><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> in the morning: <S%H7904><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> neighed <S%H6670><s%> after <S%H413><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife. <S%H802><s%>

Shall I not visit <S%H6485><s%> for these <S%H428><s%> things? said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and shall not my soul <S%H5315><s%> be avenged <S%H5358><s%> on such <S%H834><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> as this? <S%H2088><s%>

Go <S%H5927><s%> you up on her walls, <S%H8284><s%> and destroy; <S%H7843><s%> but make <S%H6213><s%> not a full end: <S%H3615><s%> take <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> her battlements; <S%H5189><s%> for they are not the LORD's. <S%H3068><s%>

For the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> have dealt very treacherously <S%H898><s%> against me, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

They have belied <S%H3584><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> It is not he; neither <S%H3808><s%> shall evil <S%H7451><s%> come <S%H935><s%> on us; neither <S%H3808><s%> shall we see <S%H7200><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> nor famine: <S%H7458><s%>
And the prophets <S%H5030><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> and the word <S%H1697><s%> is not in them: thus <S%H3541><s%> shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> to them.

Why <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> you speak <S%H1696><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word, <S%H1697><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will make <S%H5414><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> in your mouth <S%H6310><s%> fire, <S%H784><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and it shall devour <S%H398><s%> them.

See, <S%H2009><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> on you from far, <S%H4801><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it is a mighty <S%H386><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> it is an ancient <S%H5769><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose language <S%H3956><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> not, neither <S%H3808><s%> understand <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> they say. <S%H1696><s%>
Their quiver <S%H827><s%> is as an open <S%H6605><s%> sepulcher, <S%H6913><s%> they are all <S%H3605><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men.

And they shall eat <S%H398><s%> up your harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and your bread, <S%H3899><s%> which your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> should eat: <S%H398><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> up your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds: <S%H1241><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> up your vines <S%H1612><s%> and your fig <S%H8384><s%> trees: they shall impoverish <S%H7567><s%> your fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> <S%H2004><s%> you trusted, <S%H982><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>
Nevertheless <S%H1571><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I will not make <S%H6213><s%> a full end <S%H3615><s%> with you.

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> you shall say, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H8478><s%> <S%H4100><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things to us? then shall you answer <S%H559><s%> them, Like as you have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, and served <S%H5647><s%> strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall you serve <S%H5647><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> in a land <S%H776><s%> that is not your's.
Declare <S%H5046><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and publish <S%H8085><s%> it in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> O foolish <S%H5530><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> understanding; <S%H3820><s%> which have eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> not; which have ears, <S%H241><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> not:

Fear <S%H3372><s%> you not me? said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> will you not tremble <S%H2342><s%> at my presence, <S%H6440><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have placed <S%H7760><s%> the sand <S%H2344><s%> for the bound <S%H1366><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> decree, <S%H2706><s%> that it cannot <S%H3808><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> it: and though the waves <S%H1530><s%> thereof toss <S%H1607><s%> themselves, yet can they not prevail; <S%H3201><s%> though they roar, <S%H1993><s%> yet can <S%H3201><s%> they not pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> it?
But this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> has a revolting <S%H5637><s%> and a rebellious <S%H4784><s%> heart; <S%H3820><s%> they are revolted <S%H5493><s%> and gone. <S%H3212><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> say <S%H559><s%> they in their heart, <S%H3824><s%> Let us now <S%H4994><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> that gives <S%H5414><s%> rain, <S%H1653><s%> both the former <S%H3138><s%> and the latter, <S%H4456><s%> in his season: <S%H6256><s%> he reserves <S%H8104><s%> to us the appointed <S%H2708><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> of the harvest. <S%H7105><s%>
Your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have turned <S%H5186><s%> away these <S%H428><s%> things, and your sins <S%H2403><s%> have withheld <S%H4513><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> things from you.

For among my people <S%H5971><s%> are found <S%H4672><s%> wicked <S%H7563><s%> men: they lay wait, <S%H7789><s%> as he that sets <S%H7918><s%> snares; <S%H3353><s%> they set <S%H5324><s%> a trap, <S%H4889><s%> they catch <S%H3920><s%> men. <S%H582><s%>

As a cage <S%H3619><s%> is full <S%H4392><s%> of birds, <S%H5775><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> are their houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of deceit: <S%H4820><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they are become <S%H6238><s%> great, <S%H1431><s%> and waxen rich. <S%H6238><s%>

They are waxen fat, <S%H8080><s%> they shine: <S%H6245><s%> yes, <S%H1571><s%> they overpass <S%H5674><s%> the deeds <S%H1697><s%> of the wicked: <S%H7451><s%> they judge <S%H1777><s%> not the cause, <S%H1779><s%> the cause <S%H1779><s%> of the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> yet they prosper; <S%H6743><s%> and the right <S%H4941><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%> do they not judge. <S%H8199><s%>

Shall I not visit <S%H6485><s%> for these <S%H428><s%> things? said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> shall not my soul <S%H5315><s%> be avenged <S%H5358><s%> on such <S%H834><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> as this? <S%H2088><s%>
A wonderful <S%H8047><s%> and horrible <S%H8186><s%> thing is committed <S%H1961><s%> in the land; <S%H776><s%>

The prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> falsely, <S%H8267><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> bear <S%H7287><s%> rule <S%H7287><s%> by their means; <S%H3027><s%> and my people <S%H5971><s%> love <S%H157><s%> to have it so: <S%H3651><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> will you do <S%H6213><s%> in the end <S%H319><s%> thereof?
